titles.title: Jesus, Thou Joy of loving hearts

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, Thou Joy of loving hearts, Thou Fount of life, Thou Light of men, From the best bliss that earth imparts, We turn unfilled to Thee again.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Jesus, ever with us stay! Make all our moments calm and bright, Chase all dark thoughts of sin away, Shed o’er us here Thy holy light.{/lang-eng}
